text: Elliot Page (born Ellen Page, February 21, 1987) is a Canadian actor. Page was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actress for their role in Juno, in which she played a pregnant teenager. Page has also starred in movies including Hard Candy, Whip It, and Inception. Currently, she stars in the Netflix series The Umbrella Academy as Vanya/Viktor Hargreeves. ==Personal life== Page is from Halifax, Nova Scotia. On February 14, 2014 (when living as Ellen), Page came out as a gay woman. Page became a well-known advocate of the LGBTQ community. In December 2020, Page came out as transgender and changed his name publicly to "Elliot Page." He uses "he/him" and "they/them" pronouns. Page was married to dancer Emma Portner from 2018 to 2021. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian feminists Category:Canadian LGBT people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Entertainers from Nova Scotia Category:LGBT feminists Category:LGBT actors Category:Transgender men Category:Non-binary people Category:Actors from Halifax, Nova Scotia
title: Elliot Page
